  • Method Details

    • initGame

      public void initGame(int max, boolean experts)
      Method to initialize the Game.
      Parameters:
      max - indicates the max number of players chosen at the very start by the first player when he creates the match.
      experts - indicates if the first player chooses to play the game with the experts variant or not.

    • moveMotherNature

      public void moveMotherNature(Island island) throws TooManyTowersException, NoTowersException
      Method to move MotherNature to an Island.
      Parameters:
      island - is the island where I want to move Mother Nature on.
      Throws:
      TooManyTowersException
      NoTowersException

    • influence

      public void influence(Island island) throws TooManyTowersException, NoTowersException
      Method to compute which player has more influence on an island.
      Parameters:
      island - is the one we are calculating the influence on.
      Throws:
      TooManyTowersException
      NoTowersException

    • allocateProfessors

      public void allocateProfessors() throws NoPawnPresentException, TooManyPawnsPresent
      Method invoked each time there are movements in the players' school boards. It checks if a new player has gained some professors with his recent moves.
      Throws:
      NoPawnPresentException
      TooManyPawnsPresent

    • checkWinner

      public void checkWinner()
      Method invoked when the number of islands is 3 (or lower) or when the students in the student bag are finished. It checks who is the winner of the just finished game by checking who has the most towers built in the islands and, in case of a draw with this first check, it checks who between them has the most professors.

    • isNickNameAvailable

      public boolean isNickNameAvailable(String nickName)

      Method used to replace entirely the current game. This method is used for the Persistence Functionality.

      players -
      numPlayers -
      expertVariant -
      islands -
      cloudTiles -
      characterCards -
      gameState -
      studentBag -
      motherNature -
      currentHand -
      seedsAvailable -
      noEntryTilesCounter -
